directions: Combine water, lentils, and salt in a saucepan. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat; stir in balsamic vinegar and sugar. Cover and continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until lentils are tender, about 20 minutes.
Transfer lentils to a bowl. Add radishes; toss to combine.
title: Tangy Summertime Lentils and Radish
